short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects blocked websites onto a page. Choose to exit, redirect, or access the site through routine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay mindful of your internet activity with Mindful Redirect! 

This extension redirects specified websites onto a page, where you can choose to exit, redirect, or access the site. To access the page, you must first journal down your thoughts, go through a mindfulness routine, or wait for a timer to count down.

As the most versatile website blocker, whatever your looking for, there's an option for you! 

Customization Options:
